# moveRight(_:)

**Instance Method**

Moves the insertion pointer right in the current content.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func moveRight(_ sender: Any?)
```

## Moving the Insertion Pointer

- **moveBackward(_:)**: Moves the insertion pointer backward in the current content.
- **moveDown(_:)**: Moves the insertion pointer down in the current content.
- **moveForward(_:)**: Moves the insertion pointer forward in the current content.
- **moveLeft(_:)**: Moves the insertion pointer left in the current content.
- **moveUp(_:)**: Moves the insertion pointer up in the current content.
